name: Chromatic Bar
description:
Explore a small bar vignette drenched in rather unpleasant neon colours.

Developed for RMIT Game a Week 2019 with the theme 'colour'.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D: move
  • Mouse: look
  • Space: jump
  • Left ctrl: crouch
  • Left shift: sprint

Alternative controls!

There are a number of alternative controls for preferences or accessibility:

  • Arrow keys for looking around via keyboard
  • Hold left mouse button to move using only the mouse
  • Controller support
